russian_roulette.description: A game of chance. 50% chance of winning and doubling your held money, 50% chance of losing and losing all your money.

vat_of_urine.description: So this is what DOOM meant..
vat_of_urine.extraInfo: ..behold y'all, the digital VATs of urine. Added in version 1.0.1v2-prototype

scary_mask.description: It's scary, right? Lowers your chance of being robbed, does not stack.
scary_mask.extraInfo: Passive Item, does not stop heists. Added in version 1.0.1v2-prototype

golden_pan.description: A legendary item, if bought guarantees buyer bragging rights.

inf_money_glitch.description: devs forgot to patch this LOL, 100% working 2007
inf_money_glitch.extraInfo: trust, bro, this works. Added in version 1.0.1v2-prototype

hiden_codex.description: I like what this book is whispering to me.

scary_mask_special.extraInfo: Reskin of the Scary Mask. Added in version 1.0.1v2-prototype
